trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to retrieve an assembly or type by name.
trans-unit.target: 提供按名称检索程序集或类型的接口。

trans-unit.source: This service is used to load types at design time.
trans-unit.target: 此服务用于在设计时加载的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following example control provides an interface to call methods of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> from design mode.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例控件提供一个接口调用方法的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService>设计模式中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the requested assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取请求的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the requested assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取请求的程序集。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the requested assembly, or <see langword="null" /> if no assembly can be located.
trans-unit.target: 所请求的程序集的实例，或者如果找不到任何程序集，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this method should throw an exception if the assembly cannot be located; otherwise, <see langword="false" />, and this method returns <see langword="null" /> if the assembly cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 如果在无法找到程序集时此方法应引发异常，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />，而且当无法找到程序集时，此方法将返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the requested assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取请求的程序集。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the requested assembly, or <see langword="null" /> if no assembly can be located.
trans-unit.target: 所请求的程序集的实例，或者如果找不到任何程序集，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the file from which the assembly was loaded.
trans-unit.target: 获取从中加载程序集的文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path to the file from which the assembly was loaded.
trans-unit.target: 从中加载程序集的文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Loads a type with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的名称加载类型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type.
trans-unit.target: 类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the type name is not a fully qualified name that indicates an assembly, this service will search its internal set of referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型名不是指示程序集的完全限定名，则此服务将搜索其引用的程序集的内部集合。

trans-unit.source: Loads a type with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的名称加载类型。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that corresponds to the specified name, or <see langword="null" /> if no type can be found.
trans-unit.target: 与指定名称对应的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的实例，或者如果找不到任何类型，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type.
trans-unit.target: 类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the type name is not a fully qualified name that indicates an assembly, this service will search its internal set of referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型名不是指示程序集的完全限定名，则此服务将搜索其引用的程序集的内部集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this method should throw an exception if the assembly cannot be located; otherwise, <see langword="false" />, and this method returns <see langword="null" /> if the assembly cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 如果在无法找到程序集时此方法应引发异常，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />，而且当无法找到程序集时，此方法将返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Loads a type with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的名称加载类型。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that corresponds to the specified name, or <see langword="null" /> if no type can be found.
trans-unit.target: 与指定名称对应的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的实例，或者如果找不到任何类型，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the type cannot be loaded and the `throwOnError` parameter is `true`, this will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法加载此类型与`throwOnError`参数是`true`，这将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type.
trans-unit.target: 类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the type name is not a fully qualified name that indicates an assembly, this service will search its internal set of referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型名不是指示程序集的完全限定名，则此服务将搜索其引用的程序集的内部集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this method should throw an exception if the assembly cannot be located; otherwise, <see langword="false" />, and this method returns <see langword="null" /> if the assembly cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 如果在无法找到程序集时此方法应引发异常，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />，而且当无法找到程序集时，此方法将返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore case when searching for types; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在搜索类型时忽略大小写；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Loads a type with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的名称加载类型。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that corresponds to the specified name, or <see langword="null" /> if no type can be found.
trans-unit.target: 与指定名称对应的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的实例，或者如果找不到任何类型，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the type cannot be loaded and the `throwOnError` parameter is `true`, this will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法加载此类型与`throwOnError`参数是`true`，这将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> that indicates the assembly to reference.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> 指示要引用的程序集。

trans-unit.source: Adds a reference to the specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 将引用添加到指定程序集中。

trans-unit.source: Once a reference to an assembly has been added to this service, this service can load types from names that do not specify an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 一旦对程序集的引用已添加到此服务，此服务可以不指定程序集的名称从加载类型。
